backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main component controlling navigation between proposal, celebration, and future-family pages.
frontend/src/components/GlassOverlay.tsx: Glassmorphism container component applying blur and translucent styling.
Exports fixed heartfelt celebration message text for use on Page 2.
frontend/src/content/uploadedMedia.ts: Exports ordered list of 30 image paths and the audio file path.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoplayAudio.ts: Hook that attempts to autoplay looping audio and reports if autoplay is blocked.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, stored identity, and context provider.
Hook controlling timed sequential image index progression with completion flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind theme, fonts, animations, and glass-overlay utilities for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CelebrationPage.tsx: Shows a slideshow of uploaded images with autoplay audio, then transitions to an image grid with a glass-overlay message and a Continue button.
frontend/src/pages/FutureFamilyPage.tsx: Displays a future-family image with a caption and a footer linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Renders a Valentine proposal UI where the No button moves randomly to avoid overlap and eventually converts to Yes, triggering navigation on confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/positioning.ts: Provides utilities to generate random on-screen positions and detect overlap between elements with padding.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, plugins, colors, animations, and content scanning for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s requirements, existing features, image needs, and architectural notes for a 3‑page Valentine website.
